attributes.additional_details:
Aidan Burley's has made outrage comments time and again casting the wrong type of media light upon Cannock Chase.
I am calling for Parliament to respect the people's will and recall Aidan Burley for by election.
He has caused morale outrage and highlighted the area for all of the wrong reasons.
The Conservatives election pledge in 2010 was vote for change.
I call for all MP's and the speaker to allow a debate.
